narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This was a focused inspection on the non-compliant item 2.40 (b)(2) cited on the inspection report dated 5-1-17. 
The veterinarian has reevaluated the tiger and implemented a new treatment plan,
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility manager.
